name: Wolnosciowiec Webproxy
description: Anonymous HTTP proxy that forwards all requests through the PHP application on server side.

WW_TOKEN.description: Secret API authorization token that needs to be passed using 'ww-token' header

WW_EXTERNAL_PROXIES.description: List of external IP providers, leave empty to use this machine IP

WW_TIMEOUT.description: Timeout for all connections made by proxy
